TopicTitle: what has happened to the kerbal dailys?

Articles.Content: It's been a while since we had our last daily. I know Squad just put out a release but it's been two weeks since the last entry in the kerbal dailys. Anyone know what's up?
SQUAD passed out on the couch. After 1.0's release, we should give them some time to rest ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
